articles.title: Public education is facing a crisis of epic proportions
articles.description: From enrollment to politics to violence, America's public schools have not faced a challenge this great since Brown v. Board of Education.
articles.content: Public education is facing a crisis unlike anything in decades, and it reaches into almost everything that educators do: from teaching math, to counseling anxious children, to managing the building.… [+17737 chars]
